error.signature: layer already being pulled by another client. Waiting...
error.regex: layer already being pulled|already being pulled by another

verdict.summary: Another Docker pull is downloading the same layer concurrently.

dead_ends.why_fails: Will hit the same issue if another pull is still running

dead_ends.action: Deleting all local images to force a fresh pull
dead_ends.why_fails: Wastes bandwidth; all images need to be re-downloaded

workarounds.action: Wait for the other pull to complete â€” this is expected behavior during parallel pulls
workarounds.how: Docker daemon serializes layer downloads; the second pull reuses the first's result

workarounds.action: If stuck, restart Docker daemon: sudo systemctl restart docker
workarounds.how: Clears stuck layer downloads; running containers will stop

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'layer already being pulled by another client. Waiting...' indicates concurrent Docker image pulls, while 'OCI runtime create failed' indicates a container runtime startup failure.
'layer already being pulled by another client. Waiting...' indicates concurrent Docker image pulls, while 'error' indicates a Docker network with active endpoints.
